title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
- Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Sporting Events, Training Events and 
other Miscellaneous Amendments) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 12th day of 

February 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (sporting event training event miscellaneous amendments) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 12th day february 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Regulations of 2020” means the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 of 2020); 

“Regulations of 2021” means the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain 
States) (No. 4) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 44 of 2021).

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 3. Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2020 is amended by the insertion of
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2020 is amended by the insertion of 

the following definition: 

“ ‘Sport Ireland certification’ means a written certification that – 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [61] 3 

(a) 

(b) 

is provided to a person by Sport Ireland for the purposes of these 
Regulations or any other Regulations made under the Health Act 
1947, and 

states that the person may participate in a sporting event 
specified in the certification, engage in training held in 
preparation for that sporting event, or both;”.

for “Rásaíocht Con Éireann.”, and 

(c) 

by the insertion of the following clause after clause (vi):

is an athlete who is competing or playing in the sporting

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations (S.I. No. 701 of 2020), as 
amended. These Regulations provide for technical amendments in relation to 
approved sporting events, training events and permitted construction projects. 
They also provide for technical amendments to the Health Act 1947 (Section 
31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the 
State from Certain States) (No. 4) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No.44 of 2021). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [61]
